title: Calories in 1 Cup Cottage Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in cottage cheese 1 cup, including protein, carbs, fat, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
assumptions: Low-fat (2%) cottage cheese, 1 cup = 226 g serving, drained, no added fruits or flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by fat content, brand, curdling process, and portion size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One cup of low-fat cottage cheese offers ~206 kcal and ~25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 cup low-fat cottage cheese?
faqs.a: About 206 kcal for 1 cup (226 g) of 2% low-fat cottage cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 1 cup cottage cheese?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g of protein per cup, making it a high-protein snack.

faqs.q: Does cottage cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 918 mg per cup due to the salting process in production.

faqs.q: How do calories change with fat content in cottage cheese?
faqs.a: Non-fat: ~156 kcal/cup; full-fat: ~306 kcal/cup; varies by brand.
Yes, only 8.7 g carbs per cup, mostly from natural lactose sugars.
